v.v: “When Israel was a young man I loved him,
The more they were called,
Yet it was I who taught Ephraim to walk.
I led them with cords of humanity,
Will they not return to the land of Egypt?
The sword will fall on their cities
My people are determined to turn away from me.
How can I give you up, Ephraim?
I will not execute my fierce anger;
They will follow Yahweh;
They will come trembling like a bird from Egypt,
Ephraim surrounds me with falsehood,
Ephraim feeds on the wind
Yahweh also has a lawsuit against Judah
In the womb Jacob grasped his brother by the heel,
He struggled with the angel and won.
This is Yahweh, the God of hosts;
So turn to your God.
The merchants have false scales in their hands;
Ephraim said, “I have certainly become very rich;
“I am Yahweh your God from the land of Egypt.
I spoke to the prophets,
If there is wickedness in Gilead,
Jacob fled to the land of Aram;
Yahweh brought Israel out of Egypt by a prophet,
Ephraim has bitterly angered Yahweh.

v: and I called my son out of Egypt.
the more they went away from me.
They sacrificed to the Baals
and burned incense to idols.
It was I who lifted them up by their arms,
but they did not know that I cared for them.
with bands of love.
I was to them like someone who eased the yoke on their jaws,
and I bent down to them and fed them.
Will Assyria not rule over them
because they refuse to return to me?
and destroy the bars of their gates;
it will destroy them
because of their own plans.
Though they call to the Most High,
no one will help them.
How can I hand you over, Israel?
How can I make you like Admah?
How can I make you like Zeboyim?
My heart has changed within me;
all my compassions have been stirred up.
I will not again destroy Ephraim.
For I am God
and not a man;
I am the Holy One among you,
and I will not come in wrath.
and he will roar like a lion.
When he roars,
his children will come trembling from the west.
like a dove from the land of Assyria.
I will make them live in their homes—this is the declaration of Yahweh.
and the house of Israel with deceit.
But Judah is still going about with me, God,
and is faithful to me, the Holy One.”
